reviews.text: Food was amazing. The service was astronomical. 10/10. Will be back. Food had much flavor and made with love. Reminded me of my country, Albania!!!

It was very good service
And food veryy delicious
Food is so delicious and service excellent

I was truly impressed by the food - every bite felt like a perfect balance of flavor and texture. The presentation was stunning, and the ingredients tasted so fresh. You can tell the chef cooks with passion. I'll definitely be coming back for more!
Xhoana is an amazing,  always kind, smiling, and great with customers. She‚Äôs professional, helpful, and makes every visit a pleasant experience.‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞üôèüèªthank you‚Ä¶
The food was very tastyüëçüèª I will come back to eat again
Amazing place! The food at No Fork was fresh, tasty, and beautifully presented. Great service, friendly staff, and a cozy modern atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit!
Loved my visit to No Fork! Amazing food, cozy vibe, and super friendly staff. Every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. Definitely coming back soon!
Great food!
Great place. Food is amazing and service is great.
Delicious food, great service, and a nice atmosphere!

Great service
Highly recommended üëå
Fantastic experience and a high-quality product!
Best food in NYC

No Fork is absolutely amazing! The food is always fresh, flavorful, and full of taste. The halal meat is perfectly cooked and seasoned ‚Äî you can really tell they use high-quality ingredients. Every dish I‚Äôve tried has been delicious. Definitely one of the best places to eat, highly recommend to anyone looking for great food and great taste!
Food Is Very Very Good And Made To Order
Not bad sandwiches were good
My go to place ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Pizza is ok i would suggest to go to Noya for pizza way more better!!!
One of the best pizza spots in NYC

Had the naked chicken and my bf had the famous no fork. Both were 10/10. The fries were amazing! It was so good we finished and then ordered a whole pie, the honey bbq pizza pie. 10/10!!!!!! Would definitely recommend!
We had 2 pide and samuna, deff recommended üëåüèº
A simple menu, delicious food, and great service and atmosphere.
Definitely a must visit place. Food is on point and prices are reasonable. The fries had some amazing seasoning and fried to crunchy perfection.
So good, the food is freshly made when you order and the flavors sing.. Definitely will be coming back again.
This place is awesome!!!!! The pizza here is absolutely amazing!!!!! This is definitely a once a month spot to go to!!!!! 10/10

Stopped in tonight, not very crowded which was great and the food was served super quickly. Loved every bite!

The highlight of the night was Lourdes the cashier/ attendant. She was so friendly and welcoming and attentive. She was able to recommend things on the menu and elaborate on the options.

While I was eating she kept checking in on me and my guest and walking around cleaning surfaces and tidying up the space. Amazing customer service from her. Would absolutely recommend this place and I hope anyone that stops in gets to meet Lourdes.

Love this place. The no fork sandwich is very good. Love the meat mixed with the cheese on the sandwich and the side of the sauce. Definitely recommend. If I had to say one thing to the owner, I‚Äôd prefer thicker nice cut French fries to compliment the sandwich ‚ô•Ô∏è
Amazing food! Gotta try their Samuna w prosciutto
Great place, we loved the food and the service is amazing, we‚Äôll be coming back üíØ
We were here in N.Y. for two days for work, and ordered here both days.  It was delicious and really friendly staff when picking up as well.  You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Sandwich and pizza takeout style restaurant. They have few seating inside and outside. I had the ‚ÄúFamous No Fork sandwich. It comes with french fries and sauce and I added mushrooms. Together it filled me up. $16

I would go here and try the other items on the menu in the near future. I tried the Tuna fish sandwich - it's small in portion size and ok in taste- not the best. Tuna sandwich is also served with crispy French fries together with fries will fill up a small adult

Tried the personal pan pizza ‚ÄúFork et about it‚Äù. Delicious thin slices. $14
In love with Sandwiches and Pizzas. Amazing taste. üëè
No fork Famous Sandwich is outstanding.
Good food. Good price. Good people.
Wow I had prosciutto sandwich and it is wonderful taste is wonderful and different when you go there I bet you can‚Äôt get over it
Love the sausage sandwich!!!
Food in this place is amazing. Every time we come to NY we stop by and eat here. Staff is amazing and the food is incredible.
Super fresh great modern foods!!! Ate it all

I was first time in this neighborhood and wanted to grab some takeout to bring to my friends. "No fork" was nearby and had good reviews so i decided to try.
Very friendly guys at the counter recommended the prosciutto and chicken grilled sandwiches and i followed their recommendation.
It comes with french fries, chipotle souce and tiny tangy pickled chili peppers and red olives.
The sandwiches were incredible! I couldn't decide which one was my favorite - the prosciutto or the chicken one, both were very delicious! The bread, the cheese, the special souce - very satisfying!

If you‚Äôre looking for the best Balkan sandwiches and pizza in NYC, this spot is unbeatable! The flavors are authentic, the ingredients fresh, and every bite feels like a trip to the heart of the Balkans‚Äîsimply amazing service and food!
It's a pastrami sandwich on some sort of super long roll with lots of cheese and oregano. It's Albanian? It's delicious.

The staff is so friendly and helpful! The pizza selection is great and the food is delicious. A great thin pie to eat alone or share with a friend. Definitely worth a try in a neighborhood that is filled with great food spots.
bestttt sandwiches, besttt customer service, you cant get enough of their secret house sauce‚Ä¶ highlyyy recommend ü§åüèºü§åüèºü§åüèºü§åüèº‚Ä¶
We ordered the sizzling sausage. It was delicious and enjoyable. They put a secret sauce that made me want more. I definitely recommend stopping here when your in the Bronx
Amazing people and delicious food! Will be going back.
Best pizza in nyc
Service was quick, workers were nice, food tasted really good. I‚Äôll be visiting again.
Amazing food! Their pizza is to die for. Love that they have all great meat options that aren‚Äôt pork.
I love the food , service. I can‚Äôt wait to go back there again

Hi, hello- another Albanian owned and run place that I love so much. This is the best pizza in the Bronx and I‚Äôm not even exaggerating. It‚Äôs thin crust so it‚Äôs justifiable to have one pie to yourself; pleasant people and filling food matches the price. Place is cozy and clean. I come here almost every week after school and my headache goes away, my eyes see clearer. Trust me.

A subtle but sophisticated station with fast appetizers. Friendly and rapid service. The chicken soup with carrots was wonderful. We didn't taste it all on the menu, but the pride of the sausage made us feel exalted. If you're in the neighborhood, come and see this place.

Prior to visiting this business, I was excited to try a sandwich. Who doesn‚Äôt like a solid sandwich?

Lucky me, I was finally able to try it for myself. I ordered the Famous No Fork Special; it‚Äôs the one with beef, house sauce and oregano (pardon me if I missed an ingredient). The order cost about $14 after tax. Unfortunately, I was rather disappointed by the price and food quality.

They offered a substantial amount of food that centralizes in carbohydrates - great for sharing. The sandwich was approximately one foot long with a skimpy layer of beef and a whole lot of sauce, along with a size of French fries. (Surprisingly the French fries are incredibly crunchy for a take out order.) The sauce is delightful to have, and usually a little extra doesn‚Äôt hurt cause who doesn‚Äôt love sauce? For this particular sandwich, I wasn‚Äôt able to taste the meat. With the meat shredded and minced, all I could taste was the house-made sauce and seasoning on bread.

I encourage everyone who loves carbs to try this place for yourself. I personally wouldn‚Äôt recommend this restaurant to any of my friends or family.

After walking around Arthur‚Äôs Avenue, we stopped in this place to get some food. We had the Famous No Fork sandwich. It was big enough to split. One of the best sandwiches I‚Äôve had. The place was clean and the guy who worked there was nice. Definitely give this place a try.

Amazing place to eat at and friendly workers answering any questions you have. Had the Fork-Et About It pizza, the Prosciutto Samun, the Sausage Pide and a Aryan Yogurt drink (which I recommend to everyone but it might not be your cup of tea due to it being salty)

One of the best sandwiches I‚Äôve eaten.
Perfect amount of cheese. Bread toasted to perfection. Fries were good too, didn‚Äôt make pic cause wife smashed them. Guy was super accommodating.
The food is very tasty, one of the best sandwiches that we have tried in Nyc! The pizza is great too! Very clean the place and friendly the service. We will definitely come back üá¶üá±

An absolute gem in the heart of NYC(Bronx)! This sandwich shop is a culinary paradise. From the moment you step in, the aroma of freshly baked bread welcomes you. Each bite is a symphony of flavors, meticulously crafted with top-notch ingredients. The staff's warmth and attentiveness elevate the entire experience. A must-visit for anyone seeking sandwich perfection in the city. Five stars doesn't do justice to this exceptional establishment .

Delicious food and really cool vibes. I had the naked chicken sandwich and built my own crepe for dessert. My only regret is not being hungrier so I could have tried their pizza too! Can‚Äôt wait to come back for more.

Came from Manhattan to try this place and wasn't disappointed. The owner was there and was super helpful when I was deciding what to get. I got the chicken sandwich with the fries, will go back to try the pizza next! Prompt and friendly service, keep up the great work Veton and Artir! Hope to see No Fork open more locations soon.

No Fork serves quality sandwiches that are toasted and seasoned to perfection. I got the chicken sandwich and no fork sandwich, both were great. They are slim and long, so you can enjoy without feeling disgusting and overfilled after. Bread is good quality and the staff were very nice. We took to go but they have a nice seating area. Very convenient for us after a quick trip to the NYBG.

We ordered the Sausage Samuna & Beef Pide, and both were amazing meals. This is a relatively new turkish-albanian restaurant in the Bronx. It has incredibly knowledgeable staff they provided very good recommendations.

I am one happy camper, and you could be too if you get food from here! We ordered the naked chicken sandwich and the Classic No Fork the first time we came here. The food was so tasty we had to come back! Another naked chicken sandwich, and this time a no forks given. We even got a sausage samuna which is amazing with the chipotle mayo they recommended with it. The olives and peppers that came with every order is a delicious side that I find myself looking forward to the next time we stop by for another order.
If you were ever wondering about this place, definitely give it a try. You won't be disappointed!

The No Fork Sandwich is more than meets the eye.
This sandwich is insanely good and deceptively simple.

Where do I start?
Bullet Points!
- It's topped with a Proprietary/Top-Secret Cheese Sauce (Only one person knows the recipe, and he ain't talkin).
- The unique No Fork "Lobster Roll", although it's way more than a your average lobster roll, was designed and tailored to pair with the No Fork sandwich ingredients which when combined create an unforgettable experience.
- The No Fork Prosciutto is also a proprietary recipe which is Halal, FDA Certified, and cannot be found in the general markets. You will only find it in your sandwich, and eventually in your tummy.
- The fries are on point and they transform into masterful treats once dipped in the homemade No Fork Chipotle Mayo.
- Now! The pepperoncini peppers, and the Kalamata olives are locally sourced and they are basically sides, but alternating between the two as you progress through the sandwich will open you up to a new world of flavors and delight.

Bottom line/ Tldr;
This is NOT your Bodega/deli sandwich.
This sandwich is a work of art in the form of what appears to be a very simple sandwich.
The No Fork sauce is something that will leave you contemplating ordering a second sandwich.
It's hard to explain... The price is not based on what you see. It's based on the experience you go through with every bite you take.

Just try it out.
It's not just a sandwich.
You'll find out soon enough.
Great place for a quick bite. I ordered the famous no fork sandwich and it was delicious! The sandwich itself was big enough to share. Great customer service, the staff was super friendly.
Found this little hole in the wall. Don‚Äôt remember the last time. I had such an amazing sandwich and pizza. The bread is absolutely to die for. Highly recommend üëçüèºüëçüèº

Found No Fork online looking for a quality casual spot. We hit the jackpot. Food was fantastic, vibe was fun and upbeat, and the personal service was exceptional. I highly recommend it and wish them the best as they look to grow the No Fork business in new locations. Would love to see a franchise in Chicago one day!

Ordered the Naked Chicken and was absolutely blown away. Hungover and was in need of something heavy to take the edge off - this does the trick. The outdoor ambiance, the delicious food items along with an espresso to close out contributed to the perfect dining experience. Highly recommend!
I had the sausage samuna and it was incredible. The bread taste so good. The filling was delicious. I liked the dipping sauce as well. Highly recommend!

El lugar es muy lindo la ambientaci√≥n es muy delicada, la comida muy rica y el personal muy amable. Los precios son razonables, aceptan efectivo y Apple Pay , El servicio fue r√°pido casi no hay tiempo de espera, no preparan jugos naturales pero tienen una amplia variedad de sodas, cuentan con mesas al aire libre bajo una peque√±a terraza con luces colgantes y con mesas en el interior. La m√∫sica estaba a un volumen agradable y muy variado, tienen aire acondicionado dentro.
He visitado var√≠as veces este establecimiento, es de mis favoritos.

These guys are really amazing, i cant stop eating! Good that they bring some new flavor of food in this neighborhood! I came all the way from Brooklyn just to try this food! Keep it going Artir and Veton!

The place is beautiful! Very modern! Served with great costumer service! I ordered The Naked Chicken sandwich and it was bussin! It was great! I loved it! I would recommend this place and the sandwiches to others. 10/10
Enzo recommended to me THE SIZZLIN‚Äô SAUSAGE Pizza, it was amazing and I‚Äôm very surprised, because what ever I order from No Fork they cook and serve at the best. ‚ù§Ô∏è üçï
Just had the most delicious sandwich ever. Service was great too. Highly recommend.

This place was amazing. I walked around Arthur Ave for so long and didn‚Äôt know where to go, but this place was off of Arthur ave and they were so inviting. The Honey BBQ pizza was hands down the best I have ever tasted and I was told to try the sandwich (an Albanian specialty) and didn‚Äôt know what I would think of it  it tried it anyways. Literally heaven on earth, bread was soft and crispy on top, the sauce was amazing and the prosciutto was perfect.

100% recommend coming here!!!

Super chill spot! and not just because they have great central airing üòÇüíö ‚Äî The food is great if you‚Äôre looking for something fairly quick and delicious. I love that they give you the option of combining two sandwiches if you‚Äôre indecisive like me :) the cheese is delicious and reminiscent of cream cheese, the beef prosciutto is also great! What really did it for me was the BREAD!! It‚Äôs so fresh and the perfect balance of soft and toasted ‚Äî I also had the calzone kinda concoction with sesame and I‚Äôd have to say that was my favorite. I ended my meal with an espresso. :)
An excellent hot sandwich in Little Italy. The Famous No Fork Prosciutto Sandwich.

We've come here on 3 separate occasions and have tried  their pizza , samuna and sandwiches.   Everything was delicious. Their service is quick and the food is fresh. Don't forget to get their thin crispy fries. The place is spacious with seating inside and outside. Looking forward to coming again and recommending others.

Great food, good prices, friendly staff and owner and the place is a nice vibe. Aesthetically pleasing. Good photo op. I wish them the best. My fave place to go for lunch dates on the weekend w/ my teen daughter :)  the spinach pide is my personal fave!!!! wish they served wine üç∑ though
